name: Lamborghini
description: Lamborghini, or just Lambo, is a sativa-dominant hybrid strain that combines the upbeat, high-energy Lamb’s Bread with the relaxing and blissful qualities of Holy Grail Kush. This strain inherits a complex flavor profile that begins with a sharp piney inhale and ends with a sour lime exhale. Its large buds bloom with a sticky coat of crystal trichomes in a show of Lambo’s potency.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Sleepy, Euphoric, Happy, Uplifted, Depression, Stress, Fatigue, Headaches, Insomnia, Dry Eyes, Paranoid
